# Toaster - Community Discord Bot

## About
A Discord Bot made for our community

## Documentation

### Setup

#### Linux (Debian Based)

1. Install the Toolchain
```bash
wget -O dpp.deb https://dl.dpp.dev/
sudo dpkg -i dpp.deb
sudo apt install libsqlite3-dev libmpg123-dev
```
